description: Parents can download a free resource guide by Sport Singapore and pre-school experts. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Fun ideas for tots and pre-schoolers to get active and improve movement skills
title_page: Fun ideas for tots and pre-schoolers to get active and improve movement skills | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ At least 180 minutes daily. That is how long toddlers and pre-schoolers should spend on a variety of physical activities throughout the day.
Every activity that gets kids moving, no matter how brief or low in intensity, counts.
